name: Tomato
description: The tomato is the most important vegetable in the world. It is cultivated everywhere in the world, and consumed in multiple ways, both raw and processed.

plantInstructions.title: Choose the tomato variety
plantInstructions.description: The first thing to do is to choose which type of tomatoes you are going to grow, which can be determined or undetermined. While determinate tomatoes have a compact plant, and limited growth, ideal for pots, indeterminate tomatoes grow continuously and need to be pruned periodically.

plantInstructions.title: Sowe the tomatoes
plantInstructions.description: Tomatoes should be sown from winter onwards, and should be planted in a protected place, such as the interior of the house or in a greenhouse, preferably in a heated seedbed. The seeds germinate in 7-10 days.
plantInstructions.photoDescription: Small tomato plants planted in indoor pots

plantInstructions.title: Transplanting the tomatoes
plantInstructions.description: About two months after planting, the tomatoes should be transplanted to a place where the plants will be more separated, and with fertilizer with many nutrients.
plantInstructions.photoDescription: Transplanting a tomato plant from a pot to the ground

plantInstructions.title: Harvesting the tomatoes
plantInstructions.description: About 4-5 months after transplanting, the tomatoes will be ready to be harvested.
